page.title: 05MY FAMILY CHRISTMAS
page.content: It was Christmas. My sister woke me up and we talked.At 7.30am we collected our presents and went to mum's room. We both unwrapped our presents and went downstairs and had breakfast.Mum,Dad and little sister unwrapped their presents. We got dressed and drove to my Nanna's home. When we arrived, Nanna and Grandad were in the kitchen and my Aunt and Uncle were in the living room.We sat down and talked while Nanna made the dinner. At 1 o'clock nine of us had dinner and in the afternoon we watched some films on TV. We had tea and then my Uncle took Aunty home at about 6pm. At 6.30 my family and I went home. When we got there,we went to Michelle's home for a drink. (By Claire Crane age 11)
